name: Lunar Loop
description:
Lunar Loop

A small survival management game.

A lone astronaut stuck on a space station needs to maintain various systems and survive 15 Lunar Loops until a rescue mission arrives to take them home

Features
  • Survival Gameplay
  • Random Events
  • Short Complete Experience
  • Simple But Challenging
Controls Keyboard / MouseControllerMovementW,A,S,DLeft StickJumpSpaceAInteract/RepairEXPausePStart Known Issues
  • No controller support on menus
  • Some browsers have support issues
  • No Sound Options

Created by Tom Stephenson for Ludum Dare 47: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/lunar-loop

Twitter: @DeveloperTom1

Website/Blog: https://www.tomstephensondeveloper.co.uk/
